title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 108.3 - Manner and place of display
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 108.3 - Manner and place of display

State Regulations

In school assembly rooms the flag should be displayed from
a staff standing at the audience's right as they face the stage. If the flag is
placed on the platform, it should stand at the right of the speaker as he faces
the audience and at the audience's left as they face the
stage. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
108.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
